Fulfill Contract.name: Fulfill Contract
Fulfill Contract.fullText:
Contract Killer Attack 11Fulfill Contract

Singling out an enemy ensures your attacks land with the desired accuracy, so you can reap the rewards for completing your mission.

Encounter        Martial
No Action      Special

Trigger: Using an at-will attack power, you make an attack roll against an enemy that is granting combat advantage to you.

Effect: You gain a +3 power bonus to the attack roll, and the enemy takes 2d8 extra damage if the attack hits. If the attack bloodies the enemy or drops it to 0 hit points, you gain temporary hit points equal to 3 + one-half your level.


Published in The Book of Vile Darkness, page(s) 1-23.
Fulfill Contract.flavor: Singling out an enemy ensures your attacks land with the desired accuracy, so you can reap the rewards for completing your mission.

Special

Certainty of Death.name: Certainty of Death
Certainty of Death.fullText:
Contract Killer Attack 20Certainty of Death

A vicious attack from a hidden position gives you the opportunity to eliminate the target with a single strike.

Daily        Martial
No Action      Special

Trigger: You hit a bloodied enemy with an at-will attack power, and you are hidden from it.

Effect: The triggering attack deals 5d8 extra damage to the enemy, and it grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.


Published in The Book of Vile Darkness, page(s) 1-23.
Certainty of Death.flavor: A vicious attack from a hidden position gives you the opportunity to eliminate the target with a single strike.
Certainty of Death.range:
Special

Effect: The triggering attack deals 5d8 extra damage to the enemy, and it grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Next to Die.name: Next to Die
Next to Die.fullText:
Contract Killer Utility 12Next to Die

You single out a target, pursuing it until it is no more.

Daily        Martial
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Choose one enemy that you can see within 5 squares of you. Until the end of the encounter, you gain combat advantage against that enemy, and you take a -2 penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than it until it drops to 0 hit points. In addition, whenever the enemy moves more than 2 squares on its turn, you can shift up to 2 squares as a free action.


Published in The Book of Vile Darkness, page(s) 1-23.
